markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A mindless creature has either programmed or rudimentary mental attributes. Most, if not all, of their mental ability modifiers are –5. They are immune to all [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects.
name: Mindless
